item.title: Nvidia’s ‘AI Factory’ narrative faces reality check as inference wars expose 70% margins

item.title: Enterprises must rethink IAM as AI agents outnumber humans 10 to 1

item.title: Forget about AI costs: Google just changed the game with open-source Gemini CLI that will be free for most developers
